helpSummary: Can't find the producer or compliance scheme?

perns.checkHeading: Check your answers before creating this PERN
perns.helpText: PERNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
perns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PERN
perns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PERN will be issued to
perns.successNextStepsText: Your PERN has been created as a draft. You can view and manage it from your registration dashboard.

prns.checkHeading: Check your answers before creating this PRN
prns.helpText: PRNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
prns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PRN
prns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PRN will be issued to
prns.successNextStepsText: Your PRN has been created as a draft. You can view and manage it from your registration dashboard.

recipientHint: Start typing the name of the packaging waste producer or compliance scheme
tonnageHint: Enter a whole number without decimal places
